lead_paragraph: A man killed his former girlfriend in an apartment and four of her co-workers at a nearby shopping mall before turning his gun on himself, the police said.
snippet: A man killed his former girlfriend in an apartment and four of her co-workers at a nearby shopping mall before turning his gun on himself, the police said.

headline.main: Finland: 6 Dead After Shooting Rampage at Mall
headline.print_headline: Finland: 6 Dead After Shooting Rampage at Mall
